DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Most Recent Imaging Procedure Confirmation Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date of the most recent imaging procedure that confirms an abnormal condition of the body or mind.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Most Recent Imaging Technique Confirmation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Greatest in amount, extent, or degree; constituting a majority._Near to or not long before the present._Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy._Having been established or verified.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: Greatest in amount, extent, or degree; constituting a majority.:Near to or not long before the present.:Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.:Having been established or verified.

Concepts.definition: Greatest in amount, extent, or degree; constituting a majority.
Near to or not long before the present.
Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Date of most recent imaging s
ReferenceDocuments.description: Date of most recent imaging study confirming disease

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Date of most recent scan confirming bone-dominant (BD) or bone-only (BO) disease
